product_name: Keen Ketchum WP Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: The Keen Ketchum WP hiking boots provide a waterproof, lightweight and responsive platform for your terrain-traversing endeavors. Waterproof nubuck leather uppers offer ample durability, flexibility and breathability for lasting comfort on and off the trail. KEEN.DRY(TM) waterproof breathable membranes keep feet dry while allowing perspiration to dissipate before it saturates the inside of the shoe. Patented rubber Toe Guards protect feet and uppers from impacts and abrasion. Removable, dual-density EVA footbeds combine with KEEN.ZORB strobel boards provide excellent shock absorption and step-in comfort. Dual-density EVA midsoles offer additional shock-absorption and cushioning for all-day comfort. Full-length thermoplastic urethane (TPU) plates provide stability along with forefoot flexibility to ensure responsive support on the trail; TPU shanks supply added stability. Keen Ketchum WP hiking boots have nonmarking rubber outsoles with aggressive 4.5mm multidirectional lugs to deliver durability and traction. Fit tip: runs about a 1/2 size small.
short_description: The Keen Ketchum WP hiking boots provide a waterproof, lightweight and responsive platform for your terrain-traversing endeavors.
